amendment.description: An amendment numbered 76 printed in Part B of House Report 118-216 to prohibit funding from the Act to be used to terminate the Migrant Protection Protocols.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Roy amendment (A044) Agreed to by voice vote.
